archimate:Requirement.name: SC-49: Hardware-enforced Separation and Policy Enforcement
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Implement hardware-enforced separation and policy enforcement mechanisms between [Assignment: organization-defined security domains].

properties.value: System owners may require additional strength of mechanism and robustness to ensure domain separation and policy enforcement for specific types of threats and environments of operation. Hardware-enforced separation and policy enforcement provide greater strength of mechanism than software-enforced separation and policy enforcement.
